# Top level code structure

### API where we specify the CRD
api/
  - flyteworkflows/v1alpha1
  - scheduler/v1alpha1


### Auto generated clients
clients/
  
### Signals - legacy to be deleted
signals/

### All utils
utils/
  - visualize

### Compiler
compiler/

### scheduler
scheduler/

### controllers
controller/
      - flyteworkflows
      - flytejobs


### Nodes
nodes/

### Workflows
workflow/
